constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Hogsmill Valley Key Area of Change

description: Application for the Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission reference no.18/00037/FUL (Demolition of existing dwellinghouse and erection of new 3 storey residential building with x 6 flats and associated bins and cycle store) dated 03/06/2019 consisting of Change to the internal layouts and inclusion of two external doors at ground floor rear elevation; change the internal layouts to provide 2 no. three bedroom four person apartments and 4 no. two bedroom four person apartments. Total number of apartments not to change and remain as six units. Change the condition to remove the following drawing references: 36VA-AP1-1004A Proposed ground floor and first floor plans received 08/03/2019; 36VA-AP1-1005 Proposed second and roof plans received 04/12/2018; 36VA-AP1-1007A Proposed Landscape Plan received 08/03/2019;36VA-AP1-1006A Proposed elevations and sections received 08/03/2019; with the following drawing reference; 616 PL100 Proposed Elevations, Plans and Site Layout.
